comments:
I20040210 (2000)

After deleting several projects with auto-refresh turned on, I started to get
NPEs from the FAM daemon job:

java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.refresh.RefreshJob.addRequest(RefreshJob.java:48)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.refresh.RefreshJob.refresh(RefreshJob.java:70)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.refresh.RefreshManager.refresh(RefreshManager.java:71)
	at org.eclipse.core.resources.refresh.linux.LinuxMonitor.run(LinuxMonitor.java:215)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:62)

This is caused by an attempt to refresh a null resource. Since
getMonitoredResource may return null, we should have been checking for a null
resource before calling the refresh callback. Fix released to HEAD.
